UPDATE PSS_METADATA_0_SCENE
L0DATAID = #{l0dataid} ,
SCENEID = #{sceneid} ,
SCENESERIALNO = #{sceneserialno} ,
IFGCPEXIST = #{ifgcpexist} ,
IMAGEINGSTARTTIME = #{imageingstarttime} ,
IMAGEINGSTOPTIME = #{imageingstoptime} ,
BANDS = #{bands} ,
INSTRUMENTMODE = #{instrumentmode} ,
SCENESTARTLINE = #{scenestartline} ,
SCENESTOPLINE = #{scenestopline} ,
GAIN = #{gain} ,
INTEGRATELEVEL = #{integratelevel} ,
SATPATH = #{satpath} ,
SATROW = #{satrow} ,
SATPATHBIAS = #{satpathbias} ,
SATROWBIAS = #{satrowbias} ,
DIRECTION = #{direction} ,
SCENEPATH = #{scenepath} ,
SCENEROW = #{scenerow} ,
SCENEPATHBIAS = #{scenepathbias} ,
SCENEROWBIAS = #{scenerowbias} ,
SATOFFNADIR = #{satoffnadir} ,
MIRROROFFNADIR = #{mirroroffnadir} ,
SCENECENTERLAT = #{scenecenterlat} ,
SCENECENTERLONG = #{scenecenterlong} ,
UPPERLEFTLONG = #{upperleftlong} ,
UPPERLEFTLAT = #{upperleftlat} ,
UPPERRIGHTLAT = #{upperrightlat} ,
UPPERRIGHTLONG = #{upperrightlong} ,
LOWERLEFTLAT = #{lowerleftlat} ,
LOWERLEFTLONG = #{lowerleftlong} ,
LOWERRIGHTLONG = #{lowerrightlong} ,
LOWERRIGHTLAT = #{lowerrightlat} ,
SUNELEVATION = #{sunelevation} ,
SUNAZIMUTHELEVATION = #{sunazimuthelevation} ,
ASSESSMENTMETHOD = #{assessmentmethod} ,
CLOUDCOVERQUOTE = #{cloudcoverquote} ,
CLOUDCOVERQUADRANT1 = #{cloudcoverquadrant1} ,
CLOUDCOVERQUADRANT2 = #{cloudcoverquadrant2} ,
CLOUDCOVERQUADRANT3 = #{cloudcoverquadrant3} ,
CLOUDCOVERQUADRANT4 = #{cloudcoverquadrant4} ,
BROWSEFILENAME = #{browsefilename} ,
THUMBFILENAME = #{thumbfilename} ,
METADATAID = #{metadataid} ,
SATELLITEID = #{satelliteid} ,
SENSORID = #{sensorid} ,
ORBITID = #{orbitid} ,
RECSTATION = #{recstation} ,
ISSPATIAL = #{isspatial} ,
PRODUCTID = #{productid} ,
L0DATAIMAGINGSTARTTIME = #{l0dataimagingstarttime} ,
L0DATAIMAGINGSTOPTIME = #{l0dataimagingstoptime} ,
L0DATAIMAGEFRAMECOUNT = #{l0dataimageframecount} ,
L0DATAIMAGEFRAMELENGTH = #{l0dataimageframelength} ,
L0DATAAUXFRAMECOUNT = #{l0dataauxframecount} ,
L0DATAUXFRAMELENGTH = #{l0datauxframelength} ,
L0DATAUPPERLEFTLAT = #{l0dataupperleftlat} ,
L0DATAUPPERLEFTLONG = #{l0dataupperleftlong} ,
L0DATAUPPERRIGHTLAT = #{l0dataupperrightlat} ,
L0DATAUPPERRIGHTLONG = #{l0dataupperrightlong} ,
L0DATALOWERLEFTLAT = #{l0datalowerleftlat} ,
L0DATALOWERLEFTLONG = #{l0datalowerleftlong} ,
L0DATALOWERRIGHTLAT = #{l0datalowerrightlat} ,
L0DATALOWERRIGHTLONG = #{l0datalowerrightlong} ,
SCENECOUNT = #{scenecount} ,
L0DATAFILENAME = #{l0datafilename} ,
ID = #{id}
WHERE
